summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Monday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 13
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Monday, with four gaining and 13 declining.
Bitcoin fell 1.5% to $21,653 by market close.
